geonomics.help package

Module contents

Geonomics Help (geonomics.help)

Memory Help

get_obj_size Get the full size of a complex object

Parameters Help

plot_movement Plot example movement tracks generated by the input

movement parameters

Background information

Geonomics models can occupy a lot of memory, and also contain a large number of parameters to be customized. The functions in this module aim to provide some assistance in assessing Geonomics’ behavior, so as to help users better plan, introspect, and debug their models.
